snippet.title: Surviving the Aftermath - New Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Surviving the Aftermath is the next Colony Builder by Paradox Interactive and Iceflake Studios. In this game, you are leading a group of survivors in building a better future and conquering a hostile world.

Since we announced and released the game in Early Access at PDXCON 2019, we already had 7 Updates, introducing new content and mechanics, and improving the game thanks to the feedback we are receiving from our players. 

The game is currently available in Early Access on Epic Games Store and Xbox Game Preview. The Early Access on Steam will launch on October 22, 2020. We will also share more details on the PlayStation 4 launch as we get closer to release.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/684450/Surviving_the_Aftermath/
Join the Early Access on the Epic Games Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/it/product/surviving-the-aftermath/home

Follow us on social!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Surviving_PDX
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SurvivingPDX
